resources.string: A cool representation of the time for noting when you opened the phone
A list to show you how many unlocks, Wow such empty

That is OK :) 
 you can always change your mind later. 
 keep in mind that the application will not run as smoothly. 
 Enjoy the application.
Thank you for downloading this app. \n In order to make this application run smoothly we ask you to enable the application with some permissions.
Please mark this application to be excluded from battery optimization. \n This will make the application run until you decide to stop

This is the health page. \n The health page is a way to physically feel the usage on the phone, it is an option for you. \n If you want - you will be able can choose to feel every 5 unlocks or every 5 minutes on the phone as one push up.
This will be the profile page. \n Here you will be able to see insights on your phone usage and your statistics

Thank you for using my application. 
 My name is Michael Millich, I am an aspiring programmer at night, mechanical engineer by day. 
 I am making this application as a project for me to learn to program. 
 The goal of this application is to be an open source code version of the wellnessbeing app by google. 
 If you have any questions , feel free to write to my email michael.milich1@gmail.com 
 
 P.S. I know that the picture is Doge, i will place my own picture once i find a cool one :)
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
The app will not collect new data
The app might stop working from time to time due to android battery optimization
The service is running and is excluded from battery optimization
